page.shortlink: api client api a5 viewbox addelementclass method

argument.name: value
argument.description: The value of the element(s) in the view box to add the class name to.

argument.name: id
argument.description: The ID of the element in the view box to add the class name to. Must be prefixed with a "#", for example "#button1".

argument.name: className
argument.description: The class name to add to the element(s).

page.description: Add a class name to element(s) in the view box.
